description: The CAP_RR table contains information on capitation receipt and reconciliation transactions.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The internal ID of the transaction.

columns.name: TX_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of the transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Incoming Receipt


PCP Capitation


Specialty Capitation


AP Claims Adjustment


Withhold Adjustment


General Adjustment


Other Reimbursement


PCP Capitation Adjustment


Specialty Capitation Adjustment

columns.name: TX_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status of the transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Loaded


Reconciled


Calculated


AP Batched


Paid


Void

columns.name: SPECIAL_TX_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The special transaction type of the transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Manual


Retro


AP Claims Holdback


Paid By Carrier Claim


Withhold Payback


COB Savings Member Payout


Refund


Extra Refund


Remittance Recovery


Write-off Refund


HRA Remittance Recovery


Prepayment


Future Prepayment


Prepayment Recovery

columns.name: EFFECTIVE_DATE
columns.description: The effective date of the transaction.

columns.name: POSTING_DATE
columns.description: The posting date of the transaction.

columns.name: ELIGIBILITY_DATE
columns.description: The eligibility date of the transaction.

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: The ID of the user who created the transaction.

columns.name: COMMENT_LINE
columns.description: The free text comment of the transaction.

columns.name: RCPT_MEM_DOB
columns.description: The date of birth of the received member.

columns.name: RCPT_MEM_SEX_C_NAME
columns.description:
The sex of the received member.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Female


Male


Unknown


Nonbinary


X


Other

columns.name: RCPT_SERV_AREA_ID
columns.description: The internal ID of the received service area.

columns.name: RCPT_CARRIER_ID
columns.description: The internal ID of the received carrier.

columns.name: RCPT_CARRIER_ID_CARRIER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the carrier record.

columns.name: RCPT_NETWORK_ID
columns.description: The internal ID of the received network.

columns.name: RCPT_NETWORK_ID_NETWORK_NAME
columns.description: The name of the network.

columns.name: RCPT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The internal ID of the received plan.

columns.name: RCPT_PLAN_ID_BENEFIT_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the benefit plan record.

columns.name: RCPT_PLAN_GRP_ID
columns.description: The internal ID of the received plan group.

columns.name: RCPT_PLAN_GRP_ID_PLAN_GRP_NAME
columns.description: The name of the employer group record

columns.name: RCPT_LOCATION_ID
columns.description: The internal ID of the received location.

columns.name: RCPT_PCP_PROV_ID
columns.description: The internal ID of the primary care provider (PCP) of the member associated with the transaction.

columns.name: RCPT_SUB_ID
columns.description: The ID of the received subscriber.

columns.name: RCPT_ADJ_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value for the received adjustment code.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Cancel


Add

columns.name: RCPT_AMOUNT
columns.description: The amount received for the transaction.

columns.name: CANCELED_BY_ID
columns.description: The internal ID of the transaction which cancels this transaction.

columns.name: CANCELS_TX_ID
columns.description: The internal ID of the transaction cancelled by this transaction.

columns.name: RCNCL_DISC_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value of the reconciliation discrepancy type.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No Match For Cancel Transaction


Duplicate Transaction


Incorrect Capitation Context or Amount


Effective Date Exceeds Retro Window


Member Not Eligible


Member Eligible, No Cap Received


Incorrect Monthly Net Amount

columns.name: RCNCL_MEM_DOB
columns.description: The date of birth for the reconciled member.

columns.name: RCNCL_SEX_C_NAME
columns.description:
The sex of the reconciled member.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: RCPT_MEM_SEX_C_NAME

columns.name: RCNCL_NETWORK_ID
columns.description: The internal ID of the reconciled network.

columns.name: RCNCL_NETWORK_ID_NETWORK_NAME
columns.description: The name of the network.

columns.name: RCNCL_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The internal ID of the reconciled plan.

columns.name: RCNCL_PLAN_ID_BENEFIT_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the benefit plan record.

columns.name: RCNCL_PLAN_GRP_ID
columns.description: The internal ID of the reconciled plan group.

columns.name: RCNCL_PLAN_GRP_ID_PLAN_GRP_NAME
columns.description: The name of the employer group record

columns.name: RCNCL_LOCATION_ID
columns.description: The internal ID of the reconciled location.

columns.name: RCNCL_PCP_PROV_ID
columns.description: The internal ID of the reconciled primary care provider (PCP) of the member associated with the transaction.

columns.name: RCNCL_CVG_ID
columns.description: The internal ID of the reconciled coverage.

columns.name: RCNCL_SUB_ID
columns.description: The ID of the reconciled subscriber.

columns.name: RCNCL_AMOUNT
columns.description: The amount reconciled.

columns.name: RCPT_MGRP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the member group used for capitation receipt.

columns.name: RCPT_MGRP_ID_MEM_GRP_NAME
columns.description: The name of the member group

columns.name: RCPT_LOB_ID
columns.description: The capitation receipt line of business.

columns.name: RCPT_LOB_ID_LOB_NAME
columns.description: The name of the line of business record.

columns.name: RCPT_RKP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the risk panel used for capitation receipt.

columns.name: RCPT_RKP_ID_RISK_PANEL_NAME
columns.description: The name of the risk panel.

columns.name: RCNCL_LOB_ID
columns.description: The capitation reconciliation line of business.

columns.name: RCNCL_LOB_ID_LOB_NAME
columns.description: The name of the line of business record.

columns.name: RCNCL_RKP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the risk panel used for capitation reconciliation.

columns.name: RCNCL_RKP_ID_RISK_PANEL_NAME
columns.description: The name of the risk panel.

columns.name: RCNCL_REGISTRY_ID
columns.description: The ID of the patient registry determined during reconciliation.

columns.name: RCNCL_REGISTRY_ID_REGISTRY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the registry record.

columns.name: RCPT_MEM_ID_CVG
columns.description: The member ID from an incoming capitation file.

columns.name: RCNCL_MEMBER_ID_CVG
columns.description: The member ID used for reconciling incoming capitation.

columns.name: RCPT_ADJ_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the type of the capitation payment adjustment.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined
